bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: David F. Greenberg is the author of Crime and Capitalism: Readings in Marxist Criminology and several other books, and a professor of sociology at New York University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This collection contains the manuscript of the unpublished anthology, "Behind Bars: The Prison Experiences of War Resisters," edited by David F. Greenberg and Beverly D. Houghton. The anthology contains essays by resisters to the Vietnam War regarding their experiences in various prisons and jails. The collection also includes material from the New American Movement (NAM): newspapers, internal discussion bulletins, and others.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection created by David Greenberg are held by David Greenberg. Permission to publish or reproduce materials to which he holds copyright must be secured form the copyright holder. Please contact the Tamiment Library for assistance with contacting David Greenberg.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Donated by David Greenberg in 1997. The accession number associated with this gift is 1997.065.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. Materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.
